Texts.Eng: Be careful: there's a lot of bandits in the area ahead.
I am detecting low levels of light. You can use the ^green;[F] ^reset;button to activate the Krahl's headlights.
I am detecting multiple Vanguard Krahls in the room ahead. You should enter one.
I have decrypted the security code for the door ahead. The passcode to unlock the door is 55512.
Rokhan is pleased with your progress so far, but there are a few more tests for you to run.
The Krahl is fully capable of underwater operation. Do not hesitate to jump in.
The Krahl will not fit through this small door. Jump out to proceed to the teleporter.
The Krahl's jumpjets can also be used for horizontal flight. Try to fly to the other side.
The leader of the bandits waits just beyond. Be careful.
The target you are after is the large Akkimari Justicar just up ahead. Take it out, then find a return teleporter further to the east.
This teleporter marks the end of the testing course. You should return to Rokhan.
You can enter the thieves' hideout through this crack in the rocks.
You'll find a group of Akkimari scavengers beyond the cliffs ahead. Be careful: they appear to be heavily armed, and are assisted by drones and a Chaseflight.
Your Krahl is equipped with powerful jumpjets. You can activate them by jumping while in the air.
Your Krahl's jumpjets have good range, but they cannot be used indefinitely. Always mind the amount of time you spend in the air.
Your final challenge is to reach the room on the other side of this valley. I am detecting multiple hostiles on your path.
Your first assigned goal is to destroy all targets in this room. Your Krahl's primary explosive cannon should suffice here.
Your target is the Violated Elite Drahl located in this area. Take it out, then find the return teleporter in a small storage room to the east.
